General.Name: Beijing E-techstar Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing E-Techstar Co.,Ltd. provides big data integrated solutions in China. The company offers integrated monitoring solutions and software products in the fields of data acquisition; communication planning and design, and broadband power line carrier chip products in the field of data transmission; and intelligent control center solutions and comprehensive data in the field of data storage, management, and processing. It also provides big data visualization intelligent analysis platforms, such as VBI and Zhili V3C in the field of data analysis and application; real-time database platforms; and energy and intelligence services for big data value conversion, as well as power safety products, financial payment products, V3C, IcsBOX, screenmate, and environmental monitoring products. The company's solutions comprise industry based applications, such as power, communication, and big data intelligence industries, as well as smart centers, integrated energy management, and intelligent environment management sectors. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

4.Name: Mr. Ai Jun  Liu
4.Title: Chief Technology Officer of Software Bus. Department
